title: Please ID: J'ADORE DIOR T-SHIRT FONT
content:
Hi, Hello.

I need to know which font was used on Dior's "J'ADORE DIOR" t-shirt campaign, as seen in the below photo. I can't find this info anywhere !

Thanks xoxo Typo-LUV
